title: Kpop boy group song suggestions? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ballads/Relaxing Songs/Slower Songs WAVE - ATEEZ  Blooming Day - EXO CBX  Don’t Wanna Cry - SEVENTEEN  Hold Me Tight - BTS  Fast Songs/Lively Clap - SEVENTEEN  Gone Days - Stray Kids  Ko Ko Bop - EXO  Unique/Concept Different than Others (you either love these songs, or hate them) Side Effects - Stray Kids  Answer - ATEEZ  Cherry Bomb - NCT 127  Very Nice - SEVENTEEN  Bling Bling - iKON  Dark/Mysterious Concepts Hellevator - Stray Kids  Say My Name - ATEEZ  Undercover - A.C.E  Danger - BTS  Lotto - EXO  If You Do - GOT7  Cute/Adorable Concepts Get Cool - Stray Kids  Adore U - SEVENTEEN  Crown - TXT  Songs With Weird Lyrics xD MAMA - EXO-K  Regular (English Version) - NCT 127  Sad Songs Spring Breeze - Wanna One  Let Go - BTS  Shoot Me - DAY6 (band)  just some, i’m not even 1/50 done hehe

K-Pop groups usually make music in a variety of genres, so I’ll try to include some from every genre of music types/styles. Dance/Electronic Most K-Pop music falls into this category. Here are some favorites of mine!  ONF - We Must Love (사랑하게 될 거야)  SF9 - Enough (예뻐지지 마)  The Boyz - Right Here  ATEEZ - Hala Hala (Hearts Awakened, Live Alive)  SHINee - View Rock/Pop-Rock  Stray Kids - District 9  N.Flying - The Real (진짜가 나타났다)  BTS - Fake Love  DAY6 - Shoot Me  B.A.P - Wake Me Up Rap/Hip-Hop  MONSTA X - Alligator  iKON - Killing Me (죽겠다)  NCT 127 - Cherry Bomb  History - Queen  HOTSHOT - Take A Shot Slower/Calmer Songs  Block B - Don’t Leave (떠나지마요)  B1A4 - A Lie (거짓말이야)  VICTON - Time of Sorrow (오월애)  IMFACT - Na Na Na  JJ Project (GOT7) - Tomorrow, Today (내일, 오늘) Pop  TXT - Crown (어느날 머리에서 뿔이 자랐다)  A.C.E - Take Me Higher  ASTRO - Crazy Sexy Cool (니가 불어와)  ROMEO - Without U (니가 없는데)  SEVENTEEN - Adore U (아낀다) I hope you enjoy some of these songs!
